description.plain:
South Central Los Angeles-native Matthew Burdette, better know as the artist Blxst (pronounced “blast”), has made a name for himself by seamlessly mixing rap and R&B on tracks.

Launching his independent music career in 2015, Blxst achieved a breakout hit with the release of “Hurt” in 2019.  His following continued to grow in 2020 with the release of the album No Love Lost featuring tracks such as “Overrated” and “Be Alone.” Blxst has also frequently collaborated with Mozzy and Bino Rideaux, leading to hits such as “I Ain’t Perfect” and “Selfish” respectively.

body.plain:
South Central Los Angeles-native Matthew Burdette, better know as the artist Blxst (pronounced “blast”), has made a name for himself by seamlessly mixing rap and R&B on tracks.

Launching his independent music career in 2015, Blxst achieved a breakout hit with the release of “Hurt” in 2019.  His following continued to grow in 2020 with the release of the album No Love Lost featuring tracks such as “Overrated” and “Be Alone.” Blxst has also frequently collaborated with Mozzy and Bino Rideaux, leading to hits such as “I Ain’t Perfect” and “Selfish” respectively.

songs.title: Overrated

description.plain: Overall, this song focuses on loyalty instead of love. Sure, love is an emotion, something one feels for another that is sometimes reciprocated, but loyalty is an action that proves one’s love. This song sums up Blxst’s desire for loyalty, but to not be blinded by the glitz and glamour of his life. That comes along with it. There isn’t even any need for a label, just the reassurance that you are both in it together and that the trust is there. Then you both can take on the world together.

songs.lyrics:
25 ContributorsOverrated Lyrics[Chorus]
Ayy, you ain't even gotta say it
What’s understood don't need to be complicated, ayy
You know we good, no reason to be explainin'
Just give me loyalty, ’cause love is overrated, yeah, yeah, yeah
I know you love when we shaded (Sheesh)
Ducked off, they hate it when we isolated, ayy
You know we good, no reason to be explainin'
Just want your loyalty, the love is overrated

[Post-Chorus]
Are you down to bleed the streets with me?
Or could you be blinded by all this ice you see?
I'm willing to give you all this love I got
But no relationships involved
I just need your loyalty, that's all
Don't need love

What's understood don't need to be complicated, ayy
You know we good, no reason to be explainin’

Ducked off, they hate it when we isolated, ayy
You know we good, no reason to be explainin'
Just want your loyalty, the love is overrated, yeah

You know I forever lit
Money ain’t nothing if you got nobody to share it with
Heart on my sleeve, but got a problem with wearing it
Time ain't free, so if you got it then cherish it
You know the code, never switch, my love been legit
You know I'ma go all out for my (Sheesh)
And if we ever fall out, get a grip, get it right back
And if it's up, let it stick and it’s like that

[Chorus]
You ain't even gotta say it
What's understood don't need to be complicated, ayy
You know we good, no reason to be explainin'
Just give me loyalty, 'cause love is overrated, yeah, yeah, yeah
I know you love when we shaded (Sweet)
Ducked off, they hate it when we isolated, ayy
You know we good, no reason to be explainin'
Just want your loyalty, the love is overrated, yeah

Are you down to bleed the streets with me?
Or could you be blinded by all this ice you see?
I'm willing to give you all this love I got
But no relationships involved
I just need your loyalty, that's all
Don't need love8Embed

songs.title: Be Alone
songs.embed_content: Read “Be Alone” by Blxst on Genius
songs.lyrics:
11 ContributorsBe Alone Lyrics[Chorus]
(Shee) You be trippin' on the time we don't spend
I pull up and gotta slide once again
You signed up, said you'd ride to the end, yeah
But you don't wanna be alone
If it's something on your mind let me in (Ayy, let me know)
I be hoping that the vibe never end
I just hope you know that I understand
That you don't wanna be alone

[Verse 1]
I been on the late night, making sure your plate right
You be paranoid hearing sirens again (Shee)
I been tryna make time, I been movin' statewide
Hope I’m on the safe side, flyin' in the wind, ayy
You know I double back, right after running laps
I thought you wanted a hustler, girl, it come with that
I need that duck off duffle, I need that humble pack
And I'm tryna put you on to something you ain't never had
[Chorus]
You be trippin' on the time we don't spend
I pull up and gotta slide once again
You signed up, said you'd ride to the end, yeah
But you don't wanna be alone
If it's something on your mind let me in (Let me know)
I be hoping that the vibe never end
I just hope you know that I understand
That you don't wanna be alone

[Verse 2]
'Cause lately I been stingy with the time
I hate to say you killin' off the vibe
Play your position, you the realest on my side
'Cause you the one I mention on my mind
You be pressing on my line, look, I promise I'ma try
To get it right, but I got money on my mind
You say it ain't always 'bout money all the time, yeah
But she don't wanna be alone

[Chorus]
You be trippin' on the time we don't spend (Oh)
I pull up and gotta slide once again (Oh)
You signed up, said you'd ride to the end, yeah
But you don't wanna be alone
If it's something on your mind (Let me know)
I be hoping that the vibe never end
I just hope you know that I understand
That you don't wanna be alone
You might also like[Instrumental Break]

[Chorus]
You be trippin' on the time we don't spend
I pull up and gotta slide once again
You signed up, said you'd ride to the end, yeah
But you don't wanna be alone
If it's something on your mind let me in (Let me know)
I be hoping that the vibe never end
I just hope you know that I understand
That you don't wanna be alone14Embed

songs.title: No Love Lost
songs.embed_content: Read “No Love Lost” by Blxst on Genius
songs.lyrics:
11 ContributorsNo Love Lost Lyrics[Chorus]
If I go and duck off
Hope you know ain't no love lost
Might get low
If I don't take that risk, I ain't no boss
I been away for some time
But I know it's still all mine
Girl, I still ain't touched my prime
Can't just sit back and recline

[Post-Chorus]
All that time spent alone
(All that time spent alone)
I know you miss the vibe we was on
Can't deny it, so don't
[Verse]
Yeah-yeah, yeah-yeah, yeah
So I'm on ten, two four, eight
Know that bag on the way
Look, I know the streets ain't safe
I stay dangerous either way
I been through hell, wish me well
I know you won't kiss and tell
I'm not cool with taking Ls
Do my dirt all by myself
Fell out with friends, I'm like “oh well”
If you my dog, we D4L
I try to reach out, I can tell
That pride will keep you in your shell
I understand we fall and fail
Get that bag and leave that trail
They can't feel the pain I've felt
I just owe shit to myself

[Chorus]
So if I go and duck off
Hope you know ain't no love lost
Might get low
If I don't take that risk, I ain't no boss
I been away for some time
But you know you still my slime
Memories we can rewind
Can't just sit back and recline
You might also like[Post-Chorus]
All that time spent alone
(All that time spent alone)
I know you miss the vibe we was on
Can't deny it, so don't2Embed
